actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to require the Watergate Special Prosecution Force to make available to the public a report on all information it has concerning Richard M. Nixon's alleged offenses against the United States.

summary.text: Requires the Watergate Special Prosecution Force to make available to the public a report on all information it has concerning Richard M. Nixon on offenses against the United States.

titles.title: Joint resolution to require the Watergate Special Prosecution Force to make available to the public a report on all information it has concerning Richard M. Nixon's alleged offenses against the United States.
